title: Old MacDonald Had a Farm
short_plot_summary: A song about Old MacDonald and his farm, where he keeps various animals and takes care of them.
explanation: An old man, representing Old MacDonald, the main character in the song
A tractor, symbolizing the farm setting and the work done by Old MacDonald to maintain it
A cow, illustrating one of the many animals that Old MacDonald has on his farm
A pig, showing another type of animal found on Old MacDonald's farm
A chicken, representing yet another animal Old MacDonald takes care of on his farm
